mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (rev_no, rmem_no, rstore_no, rev_date, rev_people, rev_start, rev_end, rev_status, rev_request, rev_name, rev_phone) VALUES (SEQ_REV_NO.NEXTVAL, #{rmemNo}, #{rstoreNo}, DEFAULT, #{revPeople}, TO_DATE(#{revStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{revEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'N', #{revRequest}, #{revName}, #{revPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(r.REV_PEOPLE), 0) AS RESERVED_PEOPLE FROM STORE s LEFT JOIN RESERVATION r ON s.STORE_NO = r.RSTORE_NO WHERE s.STORE_NO = #{rstoreNo} AND r.REV_STATUS = 'Y' AND ( (#{revStart} >= r.REV_START AND #{revStart} < r.REV_END) OR (#{revEnd} > r.REV_START AND #{revEnd} <= r.REV_END) OR (#{revStart} <= r.REV_START AND #{revEnd} >= r.REV_END) )
